Dear John,

Have you ever done anything in my life? I've already shown you just how wonderful it is to be able to have peace of mind. I feel like I can't keep you from troubling you. I love hearing your thoughts. I can tell you all that, but I wanted to write you back to tell you all that. I've already written you my letter. Please do drop me a line or give me a call. I'll try to text you the status of the letter if you respond.

Thank you!

Tom,

You can have a one-sided statement to summarize the contents of the letter. The first part is personal and non-binary, but it includes my feelings and concerns. Tom,
